LC50; Species: Carassius auratus (Goldfish) length 3-5 cm, weight 0.3-2.9 g; Conditions: freshwater, static, 22.5 °C, pH 6.0-6.5, hardness 35 mg/L as CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 4 mg/L; Concentration: 4520 ug/L for 6 days (95% confidence interval: 2880-7286 ug/L) /total vanadium ion/
